spell.fire_bolt.name: Fire Bolt
spell.fire_bolt.description: Shoot a bolt of [key.flag.fire](flame) that deals [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.flag.fire] [key.mechanic.damage].
spell.flaming_hands.name: Palm of Fire
spell.flaming_hands.description: Continuously shoot a gout of [key.flag.fire](flame) that deals [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.flag.fire] [key.mechanic.damage] per second.
